description:
Write Unit tests for ClientChargePresenter.

Example for unit testing of AccountPresenter ( https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile/blob/development/app/src/main/java/org/mifos/mobilebanking/presenters/AccountsPresenter.java ) can be seen in AccountsPresenterTest ( https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile/blob/development/app/src/test/java/org/mifos/mobilebanking/AccountsPresenterTest.java )
